title: Ringtone disappeared
content: Ringtone does not function. I made no changes to it; don't know exactly when this problem started.  Checked volume - turned up.  Checked ringtone menu.  My ringtone does not play, nor do any of the other ringtone samples.  Once I'm on the phone, I can carry a conversation just fine.  Media volume and Bluetooth both work. Alarm works.
